channel.title: AzRoleWatcher
channel.description: Continuously monitor roles and permissions in Microsoft Entra ID and Azure.

item.title: ðŸ†• ADDED Azure role
item.description:
Id: 2d84a65a-63b2-4343-bbb6-31105d857bc1
Display name: SRE Agent User
Description: User of SRE Agent including chatting with agent.
Link: https://management.azure.com/2d84a65a-63b2-4343-bbb6-31105d857bc1?api-version=2022-04-01

item.title: ðŸ†• ADDED Azure role
item.description:
Id: 3b03c2da-16b3-4a49-8834-0f8130efdd3b
Display name: Log Analytics Data Reader
Description: Log Analytics Data Reader can query and search the logs it is allowed to view over Log Analytics workspaces and tables
Link: https://management.azure.com/3b03c2da-16b3-4a49-8834-0f8130efdd3b?api-version=2022-04-01

item.title: ðŸ†• ADDED Azure role
item.description:
Id: 53b2724d-1e51-44fa-b586-bcace0c82609
Display name: Firmware Analysis User
Description: Upload and analyze firmware images but not perform any workspace configuration
Link: https://management.azure.com/53b2724d-1e51-44fa-b586-bcace0c82609?api-version=2022-04-01

item.title: ðŸ†• ADDED Azure role
item.description:
Id: 850c5848-fc51-4a9a-8823-f220370626e3
Display name: Azure Kubernetes Fleet Manager Hub Cluster User Role
Description: Grants read access to Azure Kubernetes Fleet Manager as well as the Kubernetes config file to connect to the fleet-managed hub cluster.
Link: https://management.azure.com/850c5848-fc51-4a9a-8823-f220370626e3?api-version=2022-04-01

item.title: ðŸ†• ADDED Azure role

Description: Enables Diagnostic Logging setup for Customer Insights instances.
Link: https://management.azure.com/89f7a3ec-e9d0-40eb-9b96-c016a5c2a53f?api-version=2022-04-01

item.title: ðŸ†• ADDED Azure role
item.description:

Description: Full management of SRE Agent, including updating agent, chatting and execution of commands.
